title: Nationalist leaders who opposed colonial rule

content.question: Nationalist leaders in Africa and Asia, such as Ho Chi Minh (1890–1969), Jomo Kenyatta (1894–1978), and Kwame Nkrumah (1909–1972), had which of the following in common?

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
